bestiary.name: Goblin
bestiary.description: A small, green-skinned creature fond of mischief and mayhem.

bestiary.name: Skeleton
bestiary.description: Animated bones with no soul, commonly found guarding ancient tombs.

bestiary.name: Wraith
bestiary.description: A spectral figure that drains the life of the living, seen mostly at night.

bestiary.name: Ogre
bestiary.description: A large and dumb creature, known for its brute strength and bad temper.

bestiary.name: Witch
bestiary.description: A cunning spellcaster dwelling in swamps and desolate places, often accompanied by familiars.

bestiary.name: Vampire
bestiary.description: A nocturnal immortal who feeds on the blood of the living, possessing supernatural powers.

bestiary.name: Zombie
bestiary.description: A reanimated corpse that feeds on flesh, moves slowly and relentlessly.

bestiary.name: Griffin
bestiary.description: A mythical beast with the body of a lion and the wings and head of an eagle, known to guard treasure.
